author: jm
msg: fix Sidney's bug; if a meta rule is defined in one rulesrc file, but it depends on another rules defined in other, lexically-later files, and the meta rule is promoted but the dependency rules are not, then the generated code will omit the dependency rule from the active set incorrectly.  fix, and add test case
